item.description:
Join the Brettl-Hupfers for a hike and (optional) canopy tour on Memorial Day weekend 2010! Here's what we have planned:

Saturday morning wake up early and hike Mount Jefferson, Caps Ridge trail. This is a difficult 5.3 mile, six hour-ish round trip hike up Mount Jefferson, which is the third highest peak in the White Mountains.

Sunday morning head over to Bretton Woods for a 3.5 hour zip line canopy tour.
Check out the site: http://www.brettonwoo...
With a group of more than 8 people we'll get a discount price of $89, so when you RSVP please specify if you're interested in the tour. Reservations must be made in advance.

For those of you who don't want to do the canopy tour, we'll run another late morning, less strenuous hike, and head back to the house in the afternoon for a BBQ, music, and inevitable late night dancing.

Hope to see you there! RSVP yes for more info and directions to the club.
item.name: Memorial Day Weekend Hiking & Canopy Tour
